title: First Place in the IX edition of the Multisite Regional AdaByron 2023
description: Won the first prize in a national competitive programming contest with two classmates. The contest was organized by the Complutense University of Madrid (UCM) and allowed us to take part in the final round in Madrid.

title: Certified Developer Associate (Python)
description: This professional certification validates a developer's proficiency in using MongoDB with the Python programming language. It demonstrates the individual's knowledge and skills in designing and implementing applications that leverage MongoDB's features and functionalities effectively. Date of issue: 2023

title: Particle Physics: an Introduction
description: This course introduces the student to subatomic physics, i.e. the physics of nuclei and particles. The course is structured in eight modules: the first one which introduces our subject, the modules 2 (nuclear physics) and 3 (accelerators and detectors), the modules 4 to 6 go into more depth about matter and forces as described by the standard model of particle physics, module 7 deals with our ways to search for new phenomena, and the last module introduces the student to two mysterious components of the Universe, namely Dark Matter and Dark Energy. Date of issue: 2023

title: Machine Learning with Python
description: This certification is awarded to all those who have successfully completed the freeCodeCamp course on Machine Learning with Python. Date of issue: 2022

title: CCNA: Introduction to Networks
description: Successfully completed the Introduction to Networks course and achieved this student level credential. Earner has knowledge of networking including IP addressing, how physical, data link protocols support Ethernet, can configure connectivity between switches, routers and end devices to provide access to local and remote resources. Date of issue: 2021

title: Honorific Mentions (BSc)
description: Awarded with seven Honorific Mentions in subjects throughout my academic journey, including one in my Bachelor's Thesis. Each mention is limited to the top 5% of students with outstanding performance.

title: Cambridge English: First (FCE)
description: English language examination at an upper-intermediate level (B2) of the Common European Framework of Reference (CEFR). Date of issue: 2017.
